meanings.definition: A type of aircraft used for towing gliders.
meanings.sent1: The towplanes pulled the gliders into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The towplanes are essential for getting gliders airborne.
meanings.sent3: The towplanes and gliders danced together in the air.
meanings.sent4: The towplanes were like giant birds guiding the gliders.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the towplanes echoed across the airfield.

meanings.definition: The act of towing gliders using an aircraft.
meanings.sent1: Watching the towplanes in action was thrilling.
meanings.sent2: The towplanes performed their towing duties flawlessly.
meanings.sent3: The towplanes seemed to have a secret mission to tow all gliders.
meanings.sent4: The towplanes led the gliders like a shepherd guiding sheep.
meanings.sent5: The towplanes' job was to pull the gliders up high.
